nl: List all the providers whose locality is Germany
cypher: MATCH (p:LegalPerson)-[r:legalAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE a.`country-name` CONTAINS 'DE' RETURN p.legalName

nl: Which providers are from Germany
cypher: MATCH (p:LegalPerson)-[r:legalAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE a.`country-name` CONTAINS 'DE' RETURN p.legalName

nl: Name the providers who are from Germany
cypher: MATCH (p:LegalPerson)-[r:legalAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE a.`country-name` CONTAINS 'DE' RETURN p.legalName

nl: How many providers are from Germany
cypher: MATCH (p:LegalPerson)-[r:legalAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE a.`country-name` CONTAINS 'DE' RETURN count(distinct(p.legalName))

nl: Give me the count of providers that are from Germany
cypher: MATCH (p:LegalPerson)-[r:legalAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE a.`country-name` CONTAINS 'DE' RETURN count(distinct(p.legalName))

nl: Find the legal name of the organization with the LEI code 529900IU48N7TF5QC051
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson) WHERE lp.leiCode = '529900IU48N7TF5QC051' RETURN lp.legalName

nl: Find the legal name of the organization with the LEI code '391200G88ELU0V3SBI83'
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson) WHERE lp.leiCode = '391200G88ELU0V3SBI83' RETURN lp.legalName

nl: Find the legal name of the provider with the LEI code '894500BASL2KM3C67L18'
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson) WHERE lp.leiCode = '894500BASL2KM3C67L18' RETURN lp.legalName

nl: Fetch the legal name of the provider with the LEI code '391200LEHP3QNTNB1P39'
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson) WHERE lp.leiCode = '391200LEHP3QNTNB1P39' RETURN lp.legalName

nl: Give me the name of the organization whose LEI code is '5299004XPX8GS3AHAV34'
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson) WHERE lp.leiCode = '5299004XPX8GS3AHAV34' RETURN lp.legalName

nl: Give me the name of the provider whose LEI code is '529900VCHEILIN7BO764'
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson) WHERE lp.leiCode = '529900VCHEILIN7BO764' RETURN lp.legalName

nl: list the legal names and lei codes of all the organizations
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson) RETURN lp.legalName,lp.leiCode

nl: list all the providers with their names and lei codes
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson) RETURN lp.legalName,lp.leiCode

nl: Fetch the legal names along with the lei codes of all the organizations
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson) RETURN lp.legalName,lp.leiCode

nl: Get the headquarters address of Fraunhofer
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:headquarterAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE toLower(lp.legalName) CONTAINS toLower('Fraunhofer') RETURN a.`postal-code`,a.`street-address`,a.locality

nl: Get the headquarters address of Fraunhofer FIT
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:headquarterAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE toLower(lp.legalName) =~ toLower('.*Fraunhofer.*FIT.*') RETURN a.`postal-code`, a.`street-address`, a.locality

nl: Get the headquarters address of Fraunhofer-Institut für Angewandte Informationstechnik
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:headquarterAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE toLower(lp.legalName) =~ toLower('.*Fraunhofer.*Institut.*für.*Angewandte.*Informationstechnik.*') RETURN a.`postal-code`, a.`street-address`, a.locality

nl: Get the headquarters address of Philipps-Universität Marburg
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:headquarterAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE toLower(lp.legalName) =~ toLower('.*Philipps.*Universität.*Marburg.*') RETURN a.`postal-code`, a.`street-address`, a.locality

nl: Get the headquarters address of Philipps Universität Marburg
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:headquarterAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE toLower(lp.legalName) =~ toLower('.*Philipps.*Universität.*Marburg.*') RETURN a.`postal-code`, a.`street-address`, a.locality

nl: Get the headquarters address of Universitätsklinikum Köln
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:headquarterAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE toLower(lp.legalName) =~ toLower('.*Universitätsklinikum.*Köln.*') RETURN a.`postal-code`, a.`street-address`, a.locality

nl: Get the headquarters address of Deutsches Netzwerk für Bioinformatik-Infrastruktur
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:headquarterAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE toLower(lp.legalName) =~ toLower('.*Deutsches.*Netzwerk.*für.*Bioinformatik.*Infrastruktur.*') RETURN a.`postal-code`, a.`street-address`, a.locality

nl: Get the headquarters address of de.NBI
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:headquarterAddress]->(a:Address) WHERE toLower(lp.legalName) CONTAINS toLower('de.NBI') RETURN a.`postal-code`, a.`street-address`, a.locality

nl: Provide technical contact details for  de.NBI
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:hasIndividualContactTechnical]->(r1:Resource)-[:hasEmail]->(r2:Resource) WHERE lp.legalName CONTAINS 'de.NBI' RETURN r1.`given-name` AS `First name`,r1.`family-name` AS `Last name`,r2.uri AS Email

nl: Who is the technical contact person for  de.NBI
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:hasIndividualContactTechnical]->(r1:Resource)-[:hasEmail]->(r2:Resource) WHERE lp.legalName CONTAINS 'de.NBI' RETURN r1.`given-name` AS `First name`,r1.`family-name` AS `Last name`,r2.uri AS Email

nl: Who is the person of contact for technical related queries for de.NBI
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:hasIndividualContactTechnical]->(r1:Resource)-[:hasEmail]->(r2:Resource) WHERE lp.legalName CONTAINS 'de.NBI' RETURN r1.`given-name` AS `First name`,r1.`family-name` AS `Last name`,r2.uri AS Email

nl: Provide the person of contact for legal queries for TIB
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:hasIndividualContactLegal]->(r1:Resource)-[:hasEmail]->(r2:Resource) WHERE lp.legalName CONTAINS 'TIB' RETURN r1.`given-name` AS `First name`,r1.`family-name` AS `Last name`,r2.uri AS Email

nl: Provide the contact details for legal related enquiry for TIB
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:hasIndividualContactLegal]->(r1:Resource)-[:hasEmail]->(r2:Resource) WHERE lp.legalName CONTAINS 'TIB' RETURN r1.`given-name` AS `First name`,r1.`family-name` AS `Last name`,r2.uri AS Email

nl: Get TIB's point of contact for legal aspects
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:hasIndividualContactLegal]->(r1:Resource)-[:hasEmail]->(r2:Resource) WHERE lp.legalName CONTAINS 'TIB' RETURN r1.`given-name` AS `First name`,r1.`family-name` AS `Last name`,r2.uri AS Email

nl: Retrieve the legal contact for RWTH
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:hasIndividualContactLegal]->(r1:Resource)-[:hasEmail]->(r2:Resource) WHERE lp.legalName CONTAINS 'RWTH' RETURN r1.`given-name` AS `First name`,r1.`family-name` AS `Last name`,r2.uri AS Email

nl: Retrieve the technical contact for T-Systems
cypher: MATCH (lp:LegalPerson)-[:hasIndividualContactTechnical]->(r1:Resource)-[:hasEmail]->(r2:Resource) WHERE lp.legalName CONTAINS 'T-Systems' RETURN r1.`given-name` AS `First name`,r1.`family-name` AS `Last name`,r2.uri AS Email
